column4: @lorenz... is there a switch for your wifi on you pc?..(is it a laptop?)

no I have not--the install worked out of the box six months ago--but then stopped about 4 days ago...you think a wrapper is the right choice?
lorenz.. you never know.. if you updated, i have problems each time.. . (downloading one now)
i think it's "NDISWRAPPER" that works with all most any wireless card..(but you need the driver)
do you think a re-install might fix it?
... VERY POSSIBLE.. maybe some packages didn't get installed right..
@lorenz.. but i'd have to know what PC you're working with

ubuntu live cd with the gui
